content: off - https //www youtube com/ knitting needle watch v=ajojgfwzerc 3 easy bind off methods including traditional - https //www youtube com/ watch v=2mvplcgaplc braided ties i like roughly 24 inch / 60 cm ties but of course do what brings you joy here are two methods for ties 2 insert needle into next stitch plaited tie cut two strands of each colour i tend to cut 30 inch / 75 cm lengths you could use all one colour but you ll need 6 strands in total 3 yarn over holding all strands together tie a knot then work a normal plait using two strands for each strand of the braid i like to safety pin the knoted end to the opposite end of the sofa to keep gauge and make the process a whole lot easier 4 pull through repeat 2-4 around tie in remaining end trim and tada place marker before final crocheted stitch page 4 of 5 twisted tie cut one length of each colour i tend to cut 60 inch / 150 cm tie a strands together with a knot into one end twist in one direction clockwise i like to safety pin the knoted end to the opposite end of the sofa to keep gauge and make the process a whole lot easier once satisfied with the amount of twist fold in half keeping gauge then twist the yarn in the opposite direction anti-clockwise tie a knot in both ends trim and tada page 5 of 5
